title: Slush Block
info: Slush Blocks are blocks that appear naturally in Ice biomes. They are subject to gravity and will fall if the blocks supporting them are removed, dealing damage to any player or enemy they fall on (similar to Sand and Silt).
stat:
Type
Block
Placeable (1 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
Rarity00*
Research200 required
